text: Legend is a 1985 American British fantasy adventure movie directed by Ridley Scott and starring Tom Cruise, Tim Curry, Mia Sara, David Bennett, Alice Playten, Billy Berty, Cork Hubbert, Kiran Shah, Robert Picardo. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1987. ==Other websites== * * Category:1985 fantasy movies Category:1985 adventure movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:American adventure movies Category:British fantasy movies Category:British adventure movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Ridley Scott Category:Movies about demons Category:Movies about princesses Category:Movies about abduction Category:Movies about fairies and sprites Category:Movies about unicorns Category:Movies set in castles Category:Movies set in hell
title: Legend (movie)
